metadata.name: EMSA Camera Trapping Module
metadata.pre_description: Standardized camera trap deployment, re-equipping, and retrieval protocols for vertebrate fauna and pest monitoring

component-parameters.label: Deployment ID
component-parameters.name: deployment-id
component-parameters.helperText: Auto-generated from camera trap point ID and deployment start date

component-parameters.label: Survey Label
component-parameters.name: survey-label
component-parameters.helperText: Descriptor to distinguish the camera trap deployment (e.g., June 30 array deployment)

component-parameters.label: Survey Type
component-parameters.name: survey-type
component-parameters.helperText: Select the type of camera trap survey

component-parameters.label: Survey Start Date & Time
component-parameters.name: deployment-survey-start-datetime
component-parameters.helperText: Start date/time of the deployment survey

component-parameters.label: Array Planned Points CSV
component-parameters.name: array-csv-upload
component-parameters.helperText: Upload CSV file with 'Name', 'Latitude' and 'Longitude' columns (decimal degrees)

component-parameters.label: Camera Trap Point ID
component-parameters.name: camera-trap-point-id
component-parameters.helperText: Unique identifier for this camera trap point (e.g., CTP001)

component-parameters.label: Deployment Start Date
component-parameters.name: deployment-start-date
component-parameters.helperText: Record the deployment start date (used to calculate deployment period)

component-parameters.label: Distance to Closest Camera Trap Point (m)
component-parameters.name: distance-to-closest-point
component-parameters.helperText: Record the distance to the closest camera trap point in metres

component-parameters.label: Fauna Plot
component-parameters.name: fauna-plot
component-parameters.helperText: Select the fauna plot you are surveying in

component-parameters.label: Camera Trap Mount
component-parameters.name: camera-trap-mount
component-parameters.helperText: Select the type of mount used

component-parameters.label: Camera Trap Point Location
component-parameters.name: camera-trap-location
component-parameters.helperText: Record GPS location at the mounting post

component-parameters.label: Focal Point Feature
component-parameters.name: focal-point-feature
component-parameters.helperText: What feature is the camera's focal point?

component-parameters.label: Distance to Feature (m)
component-parameters.name: distance-to-feature
component-parameters.helperText: Distance from camera to focal point feature in metres

component-parameters.label: Feature Photo
component-parameters.name: feature-photo
component-parameters.helperText: Take a photo of the focal point feature

component-parameters.label: Carcass Species
component-parameters.name: carcass-species
component-parameters.helperText: Enter the species of carcass used

component-parameters.label: Plant Species
component-parameters.name: plant-species
component-parameters.helperText: Enter the species of palatable plant

component-parameters.label: Use Bait or Lure?
component-parameters.name: use-bait-lure
component-parameters.helperText: Is this an active survey with bait or lure?

component-parameters.label: Bait Station Mount
component-parameters.name: bait-station-mount
component-parameters.helperText: Type of mount for bait station

component-parameters.label: Lure Height (cm)
component-parameters.name: lure-height
component-parameters.helperText: Height of lure above ground in centimetres

component-parameters.label: Lure Variety
component-parameters.name: lure-variety
component-parameters.helperText: Specific lure used (e.g., peanut butter/oats/honey mix)

component-parameters.label: Trigger Speed (seconds)
component-parameters.name: trigger-speed-seconds
component-parameters.helperText: Time from detection to capture in seconds

component-parameters.label: Images per Trigger
component-parameters.name: images-per-trigger
component-parameters.helperText: Number of images captured per trigger event

component-parameters.label: Night Mode Shutter Speed (seconds)
component-parameters.name: night-mode-shutter-speed
component-parameters.helperText: Shutter speed for night captures in seconds

component-parameters.label: Time Lapse Interval
component-parameters.name: time-lapse-interval
component-parameters.helperText: Time lapse interval in MM:SS format

component-parameters.label: Camera Height (cm)
component-parameters.name: camera-height
component-parameters.helperText: Height of camera lens above ground (cm)

component-parameters.label: Detection Angle (degrees)
component-parameters.name: detection-angle
component-parameters.helperText: Angle relative to predicted path of target taxa/species

component-parameters.label: Habitat (Major Vegetation Group)
component-parameters.name: habitat
component-parameters.helperText: Major vegetation group at camera location (optional)

component-parameters.label: Survey End Date & Time
component-parameters.name: deployment-survey-end-datetime
component-parameters.helperText: End date/time of the deployment survey

component-parameters.label: Re-equipping Events
component-parameters.name: deployment-reequips
component-parameters.helperText: Track re-equipping events for this deployment

component-parameters.label: Retrieval Event
component-parameters.name: deployment-retrieval
component-parameters.helperText: Link the retrieval event for this deployment

component-parameters.label: Re-equip Survey Start Date & Time
component-parameters.name: reequip-survey-start-datetime
component-parameters.helperText: Start date/time of the re-equipping survey

component-parameters.label: Camera Needs Replacing
component-parameters.name: check-camera-needs-replacing
component-parameters.helperText: Check if camera needs to be replaced

component-parameters.label: Additional Re-equipping Comments
component-parameters.name: reequip-comments
component-parameters.helperText: Any additional comments about the re-equipping (optional)

component-parameters.label: Re-equip Survey End Date & Time
component-parameters.name: reequip-survey-end-datetime
component-parameters.helperText: End date/time of the re-equipping survey

component-parameters.label: Retrieval Survey Start Date & Time
component-parameters.name: retrieval-survey-start-datetime
component-parameters.helperText: Start date/time of the retrieval survey

component-parameters.label: Retrieval Date
component-parameters.name: retrieval-date
component-parameters.helperText: Record the retrieval date (calculates deployment period)

component-parameters.label: Final Operational Status
component-parameters.name: final-operational-status
component-parameters.helperText: Final status of the camera at retrieval

component-parameters.label: Retrieval Survey End Date & Time
component-parameters.name: retrieval-survey-end-datetime
component-parameters.helperText: End date/time of the retrieval survey
